ch.iserver.ace.util
Class AsyncReference

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ref.Reference
      java.lang.ref.WeakReference
          ch.iserver.ace.util.AsyncReference

public class AsyncReference
extends WeakReference

Reference class used by the IsolatedThreadDomain to get notified whenever a worker is no longer needed. That particular worker is then shut down.

Constructor Summary
AsyncReference(Object referent, ReferenceQueue queue, Worker worker)
          Creates a new AsyncReference referring to the given referent.
 
Method Summary
 Worker getWorker()

Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

Constructor Detail

AsyncReference

public AsyncReference(Object referent,
                      ReferenceQueue queue,
                      Worker worker)
Creates a new AsyncReference referring to the given referent. The passed in worker is the Worker that needs to be shut down when the referent is only weakly-referenced.

Parameters:
referent - the referenced object
queue - the reference queue
worker - the worker to be shut down
Method Detail

getWorker

public Worker getWorker()
Returns:
the worker to be shut down by this application
